channel.title: Publications on LightJason
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on LightJason

item.title: EMAS 2014 - A scalable runtime platform for multiagent-based simulation
item.description: In this publication, we present an architecture of a scalable multi-agent framework. This idea is based on the problem that all current frameworks are neither constructed for a large number of agents nor flexible enough to create a very detailed behaviour or add to an existing platform. Based on this problem, we try to separate different elements of a multi-agent system: Microkernel: The execution of agents and the whole system.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Here, we list all publications relating to LightJason (BibTeX format); for some publications we provide comments containing additional information about the publication.
